name: Jordan 1 Low Court Purple White
description: The Air Jordan 1 Low 'Court Purple' gives a new iteration of the iconic shoe form, renewed in White and Court Purple. Its upper spotlights a leather base with overlays and the standard Wingsâ€™ Logo. On the upper, a Swoosh emphasizes the design with a nylon contstructed tongue. The midsole is built on top of a rubber outsole with a circular build for traction.
